DESCRIPTION:

Endless Legend - 4X-strategy from the creators of Endless Space. Struggle for power on the planet will Auriga 8 civilizations. Players will collect "dust" and other resources, to trade, to develop science and magic artifacts, and to seek to equip their characters assimilate small nations. If it comes to war, the battles have to consider the impact of the relief and the ability of different units. On the global map will change the seasons, the winter is harsh, in the spirit of "Game of Thrones". The game will allow either alone or in multiplayer. The project continues the story of the world's Endless, developing after the events of Endless Space and the Dungeon of the Endless.
